name: Turret Road
description: Turret Road is a geometric sans serif typeface, with very low contrast, high x-height, high glyph height, and playful diacritics. Turret Road delves into eugenics, solar evolution, science fiction and homeward conversations. For more information, see its project overview . To contribute, see github.com/noponies/Turret-Road .
author: Dale Sattler
